title: Six Principles
author: William Perkins
summary: "To bring you to true knowledge, unfeigned faith, and sound repentance, here I have set down the principal points of Christian religion in six plain and easy rules - even such as the simplest may easily learn - and hereunto is adjoined an exposition of them word by word." - William Perkins

title: Six Principles (Transcription)
author: William Perkins
summary: "To bring you to true knowledge, vnfained faith, and ſound repentance: here I haue ſet downe the principall points of Chriſtian religion in ſixe plaine and eaſie rules: euen ſuch as the ſimpleſt may eaſily learne: and hereunto is adioyned and expoſition of them word by word." - William Perkins
